home.apresentation: Hello, i'am Matheus Garcia. FullStack Developer.
home.resumeAbout: Passionate about technology and programming, driven by the challenge of turning ideas into solutions that make a difference. I find motivation in the constant evolution of this field, always eager to keep learning, creating, and growing, while seeking new knowledge and challenges

descriptions.description_count_1: Fullstack developer with solid experience in building scalable and secure solutions, working with technologies such as Python, Django, React JS, and TypeScript.
descriptions.description_count_2: Led strategic projects in the information security domain, being responsible for system development and direct collaboration with stakeholders.
descriptions.description_count_3: Actively contributed to the creation of a complete Design System, ensuring visual consistency and product scalability.
descriptions.description_count_4: Performed code reviews and PR evaluations, with a strong focus on best development practices, code readability, and performance.
descriptions.description_count_5: Regular participation in agile squads, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver continuous value to the customer.

descriptions.description_count_1: Development of projects using React JS, TypeScript, and Firebase;
Development of projects using Python, Django, Next JS, and TypeScript;
